title: A history of recessions, and why this is not so different
itunes:title: A history of recessions, and why this is not so different
itunes:subtitle: There’s one clear difference between this recession and almost all those that have gone before. This time there was a pandemic involved, which hit demand and supply equally. So are there any similarities between this global recession and those that have .
description:
There’s one clear difference between this recession and almost all those that have gone before. This time there was a pandemic involved, which hit demand and supply equally. So are there any similarities between this global recession and those that have gone before. Phil Dobbie puts the question to Steve Keen in this latest Debunking Economics podcast.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
